attributes.action: Cancel the construction of the Covid-19 'Bell Of Hope'
attributes.additional_details: The county is applying for Government (nee Taxpayer) money to construct a 'Bell Of Hope' to ring once the pandemic is over. This pointless display could instead be poured back into the NHS to provide the much needed critical care that citizens still require.
attributes.background: Halt the planned manufacture and installation of the so-called 'Bell Of Hope' by Loughborough Council.
